text: 5:3 Rom 6:13; 1 Korin 5:1; 2 Korin 12:21; Kolosi 3:5; 1 Tesalonika 4:3Ia Godɨn gumazamizibara. Kamaghɨn ia, gumazamiziba tintiniba uari bakɨa uari isava akuir arazim, ko arazir mɨzɨrɨziba, ko igharaz darazir bizibar ganɨva da ifongamin araziba, ia arazir kabar amuan markɨ. Egh uaghan arazir kabar mɨgɨrɨgɨaba tong ian tongɨn otivan markɨ.
